newsitem.title: USA: USDA sets CCC lending rates for October. [CORRECTED 01:29 GMT 2/10]
newsitem.headline: USDA sets CCC lending rates for October. [CORRECTED 01:29 GMT 2/10]

text.p: U.S. Agriculture Department said Tuesday the October interest rate for 1995 and prior crop year commodity loans from Commodity Credit Corp (CCC) was 5.875 percent, up from 5.75 percent in September.
USDA said the rate for 1996 crop year commodity loans was 6.875 percent, an increase from 6.75 percent in September (USDA corrects from unchanged from September).
The rate matches the amount the U.S. Treasury charges CCC for borrowing for the month.
